glsa.title: TigerVNC: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in TigerVNC might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: TigerVNC is a high-performance VNC server/client.

description.p: A buffer overflow vulnerability in ModifiablePixelBuffer::fillRect in vncviewer was found.

impact.p: A remote attacker, utilizing a malicious VNC server, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the client or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All TigerVNC users should upgrade to the latest version:
